KnowledgeItem.Title: JiraModifyIssueManage
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for updating issue in Jira

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock JIRAMODIFYISSUE and triggers the workflow for sucessful completion

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
			   TargetMachine=${JMI:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   User=${JMI:User}
			   Lib=CURLPUT
			   Key=${JMI:IssueKey}
			   ToolUrl='${JMI:JiraUrl}'
			   Host=${JMI:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   ToolUser=${JMI:JiraUser}
			   ToolPasswd=${JMI:JiraPassword}
			   PutData='{"fields":{"summary":"${JMI:Summary}","description":"${JMI:Description}"}}'
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			   ContentType='Content-Type:application/json'
			   </NewBlock>
